def negate_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()

def negate_sentence(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    if "can" in words:
        words[words.index("can")] = "cannot"  # Replace "can" with "cannot"
    else:
        words.insert(0, "cannot")  # If "can" is not present, prepend "cannot"
    negated_sentence = " ".join(words)
    return negated_sentence
